arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Bologna 0 | Maignan and Pavlovic injured: latest on conditions
arts.sum: The negative notes of the evening for AC Milan come from the infirmary, with two players leaving due to injury: French goalkeeper Mike Maignan and Serbian centre-back Strahinja Pavlovic. Once again, as has often happened early into the season, Mike Maignan left the field with a strain in his right calf, a muscle that has […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Bologna 0 | Gabbia: “We must have many nights like this”
arts.sum: After the victory against Bologna 1-0 at San Siro, AC Milan's centre-back Matteo Gabbia has spoken to the media in a press conference. On Massimiliano Allegri’s dimension: "Surely it’s a start where the defensive work is paying off. Those who played up front had an incredible match in terms of sacrifice. They allowed us to […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Bologna 0 | Allegri’s presser: “We must not get carried away”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri, AC Milan coach, spoke in the press conference after Milan-Bologna. Is this the AC Milan you had envisioned? "If we want to finish in the top four, we need to concede only a certain number of goals. We created chances, played a very good match. Even when Bologna kept the ball, we didn’t […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Bologna 0 | Allegri: “I don’t think Maignan will be there in Udine…”
arts.sum: Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN after Milan-Bologna 1-0. Here are his statements: What pleasure is it to watch Luka Modric play? "Luka is an extraordinary player, it’s a pleasure to watch him play, he’s a truly humble guy. He’s wonderful, he knows where the ball will end up a minute in advance. All the guys […]

arts.ttl: Milan 1 – Bologna 0: Luka Modric’s goal earns the Rossoneri three points
arts.sum: Match report of Milan-Bologna, which just ended 1-0 at San Siro and counted for the third round of Serie A. Milan - Bologna first half The opening spell belonged mainly to the Rossoneri, who in a 3-4-2-1 shape without the ball troubled Bologna. arts.ttl: AC Milan 1-0 Bologna: Modric the match-winner on the hour mark
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan made it back to back wins in Serie A as they beat Bologna 1-0 at San Siro on Sunday night, with Luka Modric the match-winner.
